resources.string: Please configure the endpoint settings in the app configuration before attempting to connect.
Authentication with OBS failed. Please verify your password and try again.
The OBS server actively refused the connection. Make sure OBS is running and WebSocket server is enabled.
Connection to OBS server timed out. Check if the server is reachable and the network connection is stable.
No data was received from the OBS server. Verify that OBS is properly configured and streaming is set up correctly.
The request to OBS server failed. Check if OBS is running properly and try reconnecting.
An unexpected error occurred while communicating with OBS. Try restarting both OBS and the app.\n%1$s
Could not find the OBS server. Verify the hostname/IP address is correct and the server is reachable.
The input configuration is invalid. Please check your OBS scene and source settings.
Stream configuration is missing or incomplete. Please configure the stream settings before connecting.
The provided password is incorrect. Please verify your password and try again.
The RPC request format is invalid. This may indicate a compatibility issue. Please check if your app version is compatible with the server.
A password is required to connect to this server. Please provide a password in the connection settings.
An unexpected authentication error occurred. Please try reconnecting or check your connection settings.:\n%1$s
